alert.note: Alert for Barren; Hart; Metcalfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 4:48PM EST until December 09 at 5:30PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hart County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Barren County in south central Kentucky... Northwestern Metcalfe County in south central Kentucky... * Until 430 PM CST. * At 348 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Glasgow, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Three Springs, Horse Cave, Cave City, Center, Rowletts, Node, Griderville, Whickerville, Savoyard and Goodnight. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for south central and central Kentucky.
